cards.flavor: Inner strength is never seen until it makes all the difference.
cards.name: Aegis of the Heavens
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+7 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Most smiths shape metal, but some prefer more delicate materials.
cards.name: Aethershield Artificer
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

cards.name: Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants
cards.text:
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
−2: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink."

cards.name: Ajani's Last Stand
cards.text:
Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control dies, you may sacrifice Ajani's Last Stand. If you do, create a 4/4 white Avatar creature token with flying.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, if you control a Plains, create a 4/4 white Avatar creature token with flying.

cards.flavor:
"When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."
—Jazal Goldmane
cards.name: Ajani's Pridemate
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

cards.flavor: "You cannot defend others if your own well-being is neglected."
cards.name: Ajani's Welcome
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: She sings for all those who have been silenced.
cards.name: Angel of the Dawn
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

cards.name: Cavalry Drillmaster
cards.text: When Cavalry Drillmaster enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

cards.flavor: In their final moments, the demons gazed upon grace in its purest form.
cards.name: Cleansing Nova
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

cards.flavor: "May the light shine through me to guide the lost."
cards.name: Daybreak Chaplain
cards.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.flavor: "These storied halls are under my protection."
cards.name: Dwarven Priest
cards.text: When Dwarven Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

cards.flavor: "Our duty does not stop at our borders."
cards.name: Gallant Cavalry
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Gallant Cavalry enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

cards.flavor: The clerics prayed for salvation. The soldiers prayed for victory. Both prayers were answered.
cards.name: Herald of Faith
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Herald of Faith attacks, you gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: Law protects but also contains.
cards.name: Hieromancer's Cage
cards.text: When Hieromancer's Cage enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Hieromancer's Cage leaves the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants, . . . and they were barely a tenth of our number!"
—General Avitora
cards.name: Inspired Charge
cards.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Let go of all that harms you. Cast your burdens into the darkness, and build for the faithful a house of light." —Song of All, canto 1008
cards.name: Invoke the Divine
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: Threefold were his crimes, doubled were his pleas, singular was his fate.
cards.name: Isolate
cards.text: Exile target permanent with converted mana cost 1.

cards.flavor: "Horse? Who needs a horse?"
cards.name: Knight of the Tusk
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.flavor: "As long as my faith persists, so shall I."
cards.name: Knight's Pledge
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

cards.name: Knightly Valor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

cards.flavor: "Those who do evil and those who do nothing are equally worthy of contempt."
cards.name: Lena, Selfless Champion
cards.text:
When Lena, Selfless Champion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token for each nontoken creature you control.
Sacrifice Lena: Creatures you control with power less than Lena's power gain indestructible until end of turn.

cards.flavor: The best fighters are skilled in both harming and healing.
cards.name: Leonin Vanguard
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, Leonin Vanguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: When one leonin hunts, many more are surely nearby.
cards.name: Leonin Warleader
cards.text: Whenever Leonin Warleader attacks, create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink that are tapped and attacking.

cards.flavor: Loxodons are firm in stature and spirit. No matter the odds, they are always first into battle.
cards.name: Loxodon Line Breaker

cards.flavor: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."
cards.name: Luminous Bonds
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

cards.flavor: For a moment they stood tall, all fear forgotten.
cards.name: Make a Stand
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

cards.flavor: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."
cards.name: Mentor of the Meek
cards.text: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."
cards.name: Mighty Leap
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Militia Bugler
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Militia Bugler enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with power 2 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor: Even the greatest hero begins with nothing.
cards.name: Novice Knight
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
As long as Novice Knight is enchanted or equipped, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

cards.flavor: The leonin of Oreskos are quick to take offense—not because they are thin-skinned, but because they are always ready for a fight.
cards.name: Oreskos Swiftclaw

cards.flavor: A pegasus chooses its rider, bearing the worthy into the clouds and tossing all others to the ground.
cards.name: Pegasus Courser
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Pegasus Courser attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor: A lifetime of keeping up appearances is not enough to earn an eternity of rest.
cards.name: Remorseful Cleric
cards.text:
Flying
Sacrifice Remorseful Cleric: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

cards.name: Resplendent Angel
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 5 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
{3}{W}{W}{W}: Until end of turn, Resplendent Angel gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink.

cards.flavor:
"A potion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in."
—Torricks, battlefield medic
cards.name: Revitalize
cards.text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Native to wide prairies and scrublands, falcons occasionally roost in dragon skeletons.
cards.name: Rustwing Falcon
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: When it passes, order defeats chaos.
cards.name: Shield Mare
cards.text:
Shield Mare can't be blocked by red creatures.
When Shield Mare enters the battlefield or becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: White as starlight on snow, it appears only on the eve of the winter solstice.
cards.name: Star-Crowned Stag
cards.text: Whenever Star-Crowned Stag attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

cards.name: Suncleanser
cards.text:
When Suncleanser enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Remove all counters from target creature. It can't have counters put on it for as long as Suncleanser remains on the battlefield.
• Target opponent loses all counters. That player can't get counters for as long as Suncleanser remains on the battlefield.

cards.flavor: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."
cards.name: Take Vengeance
cards.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

cards.flavor:
"Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."
—Hewen Frit, merchant
cards.name: Trusty Packbeast
cards.text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: "Defeat is no reason for retreat. It is a sign we must redouble our efforts to win this fight."
cards.name: Valiant Knight
cards.text:
Other Knights you control get +1/+1.
{3}{W}{W}: Knights you control gain double strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: If you can't find a doorway, make one.
cards.name: Aether Tunnel
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.

cards.flavor: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.
cards.name: Anticipate
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: "My skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."
cards.name: Aven Wind Mage
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "They say perfection is unattainable, but they said that about flight too."
cards.name: Aviation Pioneer
cards.text: When Aviation Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

cards.flavor:
"I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist
cards.name: Bone to Ash
cards.text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "I decide what stands in my way."
cards.name: Cancel
cards.text: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Departed Deckhand
cards.text:
When Departed Deckhand becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.
Departed Deckhand can't be blocked except by Spirits.
{3}{U}: Another target creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by Spirits.

cards.flavor: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.
cards.name: Disperse
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: "The stars mark your destiny. May you accept the fate thus divulged."
cards.name: Divination
cards.text: Draw two cards.

cards.name: Djinn of Wishes
cards.text:
Flying
Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.
{2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

cards.flavor: The collection didn't have room to expand, so the wizard improvised a solution.
cards.name: Dwindle
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -6/-0.
When enchanted creature blocks, destroy it. (The attacking creature remains blocked.)

cards.flavor: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.
cards.name: Essence Scatter
cards.text: Counter target creature spell.

cards.flavor: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.
cards.name: Exclusion Mage
cards.text: When Exclusion Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!"
—Gertrude, deep-sea angler
cards.name: Frilled Sea Serpent
cards.text: {5}{U}{U}: Frilled Sea Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: Young artificers on Kaladesh let their imaginations run wild.
cards.name: Gearsmith Prodigy
cards.text: Gearsmith Prodigy gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.

cards.flavor: "Picking locks is for beginners."
cards.name: Ghostform
cards.text: Up to two target creatures can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Horizon Scholar
cards.text:
Flying
When Horizon Scholar enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Metamorphic Alteration
cards.text:
Enchant creature
As Metamorphic Alteration enters the battlefield, choose a creature.
Enchanted creature is a copy of the chosen creature.

cards.flavor: The life of a shapeshifter is one of constant change.
cards.name: Mirror Image
cards.text: You may have Mirror Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature you control.

cards.flavor: Hospitality is of little concern to those who do not wish to be disturbed.
cards.name: Mistcaller
cards.text: Sacrifice Mistcaller: Until end of turn, if a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

cards.flavor: The delight of discovery drives the pursuit of knowledge.
cards.name: Mystic Archaeologist
cards.text: {3}{U}{U}: Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.
cards.name: Omenspeaker
cards.text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor:
"The things I once imagined would be my greatest achievements were only the first steps toward a future I can only begin to fathom."
—Jace Beleren
cards.name: Omniscience
cards.text: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

cards.flavor:
"When I grafted the Planar Bridge into myself I felt my Planeswalker spark flare beyond my body. The Multiverse was my plaything. It felt . . . incredible."
—Tezzeret
cards.name: One with the Machine
cards.text: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among artifacts you control.

cards.flavor: Nicol Bolas would not rest until he was restored to his former glory.
cards.name: Patient Rebuilding
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard, then you draw a card for each land card put into that graveyard this way.

cards.flavor:
"To break another's mind is to deliver a fate worse than death. It is a terrifying power."
—Jace Beleren
cards.name: Psychic Corrosion
cards.text: Whenever you draw a card, each opponent puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

cards.flavor: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."
cards.name: Sai, Master Thopterist
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: The greatest treasure of the deep is an echo from above.
cards.name: Salvager of Secrets
cards.text: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: "The path of the stars is as reliable as the instruments that measure them."
cards.name: Scholar of Stars
cards.text: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Dwell longest on the thoughts that shine brightest.
cards.name: Sift
cards.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

cards.name: Skilled Animator
cards.text: When Skilled Animator enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as Skilled Animator remains on the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious."
—Garild, merfolk mage
cards.name: Sleep
cards.text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

cards.flavor: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.
cards.name: Snapping Drake
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: A king's knowledge does not vanish when the heart stops beating.
cards.name: Supreme Phantom
cards.text:
Flying
Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor: When it passes, waves touch the sky.
cards.name: Surge Mare
cards.text:
Surge Mare can't be blocked by green creatures.
Whenever Surge Mare deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
{1}{U}: Surge Mare gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Say hello to your new friend.
cards.name: Switcheroo
cards.text: Exchange control of two target creatures.

cards.name: Tezzeret, Artifice Master
cards.text:
+1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
0: Draw a card. If you control three or more artifacts, draw two cards instead.
−9: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library."

cards.flavor: The Tolarian Academies embrace a tradition of study and research while discouraging the kinds of experiments that ruined the original island of Tolaria.
cards.name: Tolarian Scholar

cards.flavor: Fblthp had always hated crowds.
cards.name: Totally Lost
cards.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

cards.flavor: The cold slowed their movements until only their panicked eyeballs swiveled beneath the ice.
cards.name: Uncomfortable Chill
cards.text:
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: The seafloor is flecked with the bones of fools who dared to sail into the mist.
cards.name: Wall of Mist
cards.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

cards.flavor: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."
cards.name: Windreader Sphinx
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.

cards.flavor: Tenacity prevails when hopes die.
cards.name: Abnormal Endurance
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

cards.flavor: Predicting the future is a messy business.
cards.name: Blood Divination
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw three cards.

cards.flavor:
"They are gentle herbivores, despite their size. Approach cautiously, and hum a tune to let them know you mean no harm."
—Vivien Reid
cards.name: Bogstomper

cards.flavor: Its roar is the clatter of a thousand bones.
cards.name: Bone Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
{3}{B}{B}, Exile seven other cards from your graveyard: Return Bone Dragon from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.
cards.name: Child of Night
cards.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.flavor: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.
cards.name: Death Baron
cards.text: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

cards.flavor: A pit yawned open, a column of oily smoke arose, and a towering form hissed, "I accept this offering."
cards.name: Demon of Catastrophes
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Flying, trample

cards.flavor:
"At least this one still has arms and legs. Well, most of its legs."
—Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia
cards.name: Diregraf Ghoul
cards.text: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.
cards.name: Doomed Dissenter
cards.text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.flavor:
"It hurts more if you think about it."
—Hooks, Cabal torturer
cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.flavor: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."
cards.name: Epicure of Blood
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

cards.name: Fell Specter
cards.text:
Flying
When Fell Specter enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.

cards.flavor: The Great Mending that healed the Multiverse also unraveled the threads of Nicol Bolas's power.
cards.name: Fraying Omnipotence
cards.text: Each player loses half their life, then discards half the cards in their hand, then sacrifices half the creatures they control. Round up each time.

cards.flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.
cards.name: Gravedigger
cards.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Rise and shine, my dears. We have work to do."
—Isareth the Awakener
cards.name: Graveyard Marshal
cards.text: {2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.flavor: "If you want them dead, buy some poison. If you want them to have the worst day of their life before dying, then let's talk price."
cards.name: Hired Blade
cards.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

cards.flavor: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.
cards.name: Infectious Horror
cards.text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

cards.flavor: "When these intruders are gone, Zendikar will be my throne, my palace, my playground."
cards.name: Infernal Reckoning
cards.text: Exile target colorless creature. You gain life equal to its power.

cards.flavor: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.
cards.name: Infernal Scarring
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."

cards.name: Isareth the Awakener
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Isareth the Awakener attacks, you may pay {X}. When you do, return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a corpse counter on it. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

cards.flavor: A lich must consume mortal souls to feed its eternal life.
cards.name: Lich's Caress
cards.text: Destroy target creature. You gain 3 life.

cards.name: Liliana, Untouched by Death
cards.text:
+1: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. If at least one of them is a Zombie card, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
−2: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
−3: You may cast Zombie cards from your graveyard this turn.

cards.flavor: Immortality is worth any price.
cards.name: Liliana's Contract
cards.text:
When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.

cards.flavor: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.
cards.name: Macabre Waltz
cards.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.

cards.flavor: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.
cards.name: Mind Rot
cards.text: Target player discards two cards.

cards.flavor: "It's not work if you enjoy it."
cards.name: Murder
cards.text: Destroy target creature.

cards.flavor: That feeling of something on your chest is usually sleep paralysis. Occasionally, it's something else.
cards.name: Nightmare's Thirst
cards.text: You gain 1 life. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

cards.flavor: It was a night like any other. It would soon become a night no one would ever forget.
cards.name: Open the Graves
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Phylactery Lich
cards.text:
Indestructible
As Phylactery Lich enters the battlefield, put a phylactery counter on an artifact you control.
When you control no permanents with phylactery counters on them, sacrifice Phylactery Lich.

cards.flavor: When it passes, those who sleep dream of sickness and death.
cards.name: Plague Mare
cards.text:
Plague Mare can't be blocked by white creatures.
When Plague Mare enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: A harpy's hoard is a filthy, bloodstained pile of trinkets and corpses.
cards.name: Ravenous Harpy
cards.text:
Flying
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Harpy.

cards.flavor:
"They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord
cards.name: Reassembling Skeleton
cards.text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

cards.flavor:
"Death is no excuse for disobedience."
—Liliana Vess
cards.name: Rise from the Grave
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

cards.flavor:
"When it comes to killing with precision, a soul is but a hindrance."
—Isareth the Awakener
cards.name: Skeleton Archer
cards.text: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.
cards.name: Skymarch Bloodletter
cards.text:
Flying
When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"You have given all to your kingdom, dear knight. Serenity shall be your prize."
—Queen Lian
cards.name: Sovereign's Bite
cards.text: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: No part goes to waste.
cards.name: Stitcher's Supplier
cards.text: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: Imagine a thousand tiny mushrooms cropping up within your lungs.
cards.name: Strangling Spores
cards.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Thread the torsos together with angel hair to ensure they will cooperate in battle." —The Stitcher's Tome
cards.name: Two-Headed Zombie
cards.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.flavor: One day, they may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, they possess nothing but thirst.
cards.name: Vampire Neonate
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"Your service shall be rewarded."
—Queen Lian
cards.name: Vampire Sovereign
cards.text:
Flying
When Vampire Sovereign enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia
cards.name: Walking Corpse

cards.flavor: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.
cards.name: Act of Treason
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

cards.flavor:
"A rare and fascinating phenomenon."
—Tamiyo
cards.name: Alpine Moon
cards.text:
As Alpine Moon enters the battlefield, choose a nonbasic land card name.
Lands your opponents control with the chosen name lose all land types and abilities, and they gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

cards.flavor:
"As I desire, so it shall be."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Apex of Power
cards.text:
Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast nonland cards exiled this way.
If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.

cards.flavor: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.
cards.name: Banefire
cards.text:
Banefire deals X damage to any target.
If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

cards.flavor: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.
cards.name: Boggart Brute
cards.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.flavor: As the hyperstormic generator crept past redline, a being emerged from the arc.
cards.name: Catalyst Elemental
cards.text: Sacrifice Catalyst Elemental: Add {R}{R}.

cards.name: Crash Through
cards.text:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.
cards.name: Dark-Dweller Oracle
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

cards.flavor: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.
cards.name: Demanding Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: "Burn. Burn. Keep. Burn."
cards.name: Dismissive Pyromancer
cards.text:
{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
{2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Dismissive Pyromancer: It deals 4 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: First the insult, then the encore.
cards.name: Doublecast
cards.text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.
cards.name: Dragon Egg
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

cards.flavor: "Some hid from the storm. I embraced it and learned its name."
cards.name: Electrify
cards.text: Electrify deals 4 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: Negotiations reached an abrupt conclusion.
cards.name: Fiery Finish
cards.text: Fiery Finish deals 7 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor: It treads on feet of coals and strikes with the force of a volcano.
cards.name: Fire Elemental

cards.flavor: "We can take 'em. You go first!"
cards.name: Goblin Instigator
cards.text: When Goblin Instigator enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

cards.flavor: Small words stoke large flames.
cards.name: Goblin Motivator
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

cards.flavor: "Folks 'round here are too in love with their contraptions. Does them some good if we smash one every so often."
cards.name: Goblin Trashmaster
cards.text:
Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.
Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target artifact.

cards.flavor: "I found a new toy. Wanna play?"
cards.name: Guttersnipe
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

cards.flavor: For devils, burning things is the highest form of comedy, diversion, and artistic expression.
cards.name: Havoc Devils
cards.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.flavor: The bellow of a minotaur always translates to "charge."
cards.name: Hostile Minotaur
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

cards.name: Inferno Hellion
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
At the beginning of each end step, if Inferno Hellion attacked or blocked this turn, its owner shuffles it into their library.

cards.name: Lathliss, Dragon Queen
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
{1}{R}: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Catch!"
cards.name: Lava Axe
cards.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: When it passes, storm clouds bolt across the land.
cards.name: Lightning Mare
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Lightning Mare can't be blocked by blue creatures.
{1}{R}: Lightning Mare gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.
cards.name: Lightning Strike
cards.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: The ogres you know are nothing like the Onakke. Possessing both intellect and industry, they had brute strength without being brutish.
cards.name: Onakke Ogre
Sarkhan, Fireblood
cards.text:
+1: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
+1: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells.
−7: Create four 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

cards.name: Sarkhan's Unsealing
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 4, 5, or 6, Sarkhan's Unsealing deals 4 damage to any target.
Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 7 or greater, Sarkhan's Unsealing deals 4 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.

cards.flavor: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.
cards.name: Shock
cards.text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: No rampart can withstand the fury of a giant.
cards.name: Siegebreaker Giant
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
{3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.

cards.flavor: The creation of new weapons demands the destruction of others.
cards.name: Smelt
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.

cards.flavor: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.
cards.name: Sparktongue Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.

cards.name: Spit Flame
cards.text:
Spit Flame deals 4 damage to target creature.
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Spit Flame from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: To survive imminent doom, it sometimes takes a foolhardy soul who acts first and fears later.
cards.name: Sure Strike
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

cards.flavor:
"You will kneel before me, even if I have to split the earth under your feet!"
—Ash Kronor, Keldon warlord
cards.name: Tectonic Rift
cards.text: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

cards.flavor:
"Give 'em a push."
—Mogwin, goblin delinquent
cards.name: Thud
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Thud deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

cards.flavor:
"Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"
—Sarkhan Vol
cards.name: Tormenting Voice
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: The sound of the trumpets lights a fire in the hearts of the bold and snuffs the courage of the cowardly.
cards.name: Trumpet Blast
cards.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "I trained with the Ghitu, and I respect the fire as they do."
cards.name: Viashino Pyromancer
cards.text: When Viashino Pyromancer enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.
cards.name: Volcanic Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

cards.flavor: "Fill the sky with stuff!"
cards.name: Volley Veteran
cards.text: When Volley Veteran enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.

cards.name: Blanchwood Armor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

cards.flavor:
"Nicol Bolas destroyed my world. I owe it to Skalla to celebrate all life, no matter how dangerous."
—Vivien Reid
cards.name: Bristling Boar
cards.text: Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.flavor:
"The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."
—Ramal, sage of Westgate
cards.name: Centaur Courser

cards.flavor: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.
cards.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
cards.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.flavor:
"Might doesn't just build empires. It protects them."
—Inti, Sun Empire knight
cards.name: Colossal Majesty
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Its ventricles weep venom, and it consumes only poison.
cards.name: Daggerback Basilisk
cards.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor:
"If you think yourself a chief, then prove your might."
—Gar-Tun, Mistvalley silverback
cards.name: Declare Dominance
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. All creatures able to block it this turn do so.

cards.flavor: No welcome for those who trespass. Only fang and horn and claw.
cards.name: Druid of Horns
cards.text: Whenever you cast an Aura spell that targets Druid of Horns, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

cards.flavor: "The wild tangle of the Cowl provides sanctuary to life that watched the first buildings rise."
cards.name: Druid of the Cowl
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}.

cards.flavor: "The land already knows its destiny. I simply ask it to share the tale with me."
cards.name: Dryad Greenseeker
cards.text: {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

cards.flavor: No single root feeds the forest.
cards.name: Elvish Clancaller
cards.text:
Other Elves you control get +1/+1.
{4}{G}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Elvish Clancaller, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Elvish Rejuvenator
cards.text: When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor: They grow closer with every passing season.
cards.name: Ghastbark Twins
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Ghastbark Twins can block an additional creature each combat.

cards.flavor: Fairgoers were delighted to find that even outside the fairgrounds, Ghirapur was a city of wonders.
cards.name: Ghirapur Guide
cards.text: {2}{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

cards.flavor:
"After everything I've survived, it's hard to be frightened by anything anymore."
—Vivien Reid
cards.name: Giant Spider
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

cards.name: Gift of Paradise
cards.text:
Enchant land
When Gift of Paradise enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

cards.flavor:
"Each tooth is the length of a horse, and new ones grow in every sixteen days. Let's get a closer look!"
—Vivien Reid
cards.name: Gigantosaurus

cards.flavor: You don't want to know how she got that name.
cards.name: Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma
cards.text:
Creature spells you cast with power 4 or greater cost {2} less to cast.
Whenever Goreclaw, Terror of Qal Sisma attacks, each creature you control with power 4 or greater gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.
cards.name: Greenwood Sentinel
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.flavor:
"Bring down a stag and fix its horns upon Arel's head. She hears the wisdom of our ancestors."
—Chianul, Who Whispers Twice
cards.name: Highland Game
cards.text: When Highland Game dies, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Hungering Hydra
cards.text:
Hungering Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Hungering Hydra can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Whenever Hungering Hydra is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.)

cards.flavor:
"And if you threaten me again, your shiny steel trousers will be sprouting daggerthorn vines."
—Iveta, rooftop runner
cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"
—Dionus, elvish archdruid
cards.name: Oakenform
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

cards.flavor: It eats what it wants to eat—which is anything that moves.
cards.name: Pelakka Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life.
When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid
cards.name: Plummet
cards.text: Destroy target creature with flying.

cards.flavor:
"Look how cute it is now!"
—Vivien Reid
cards.name: Prodigious Growth
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +7/+7 and has trample.

cards.flavor: "You should have seen the look on both their faces." —Morkamp, Lambholt innkeeper
cards.name: Rabid Bite
cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

cards.flavor: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."
cards.name: Reclamation Sage
cards.text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: "The bones of the past will tell their tales—if you know how to speak their language."
cards.name: Recollect
cards.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: "The further into the future I look, the less certain my vision. Even now, the middle distance is obscured by fire."
cards.name: Rhox Oracle
cards.text: When Rhox Oracle enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.flavor: The only casualties were a snapped spear, a lost helmet, and some bruised egos.
cards.name: Root Snare
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

cards.flavor: The Sun Empire's most sacred sites are protected by more than prayers.
cards.name: Runic Armasaur
cards.text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a creature or land that isn't a mana ability, you may draw a card.

cards.flavor: "Whether we like it or not, our arrival has altered the landscape." —Malcolm, navigator of the Belligerent
cards.name: Scapeshift
cards.text: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Talons of Wildwood
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
{2}{G}: Return Talons of Wildwood from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Thorn Lieutenant
cards.text:
Whenever Thorn Lieutenant becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
{5}{G}: Thorn Lieutenant gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Halana grew brambles to create a barricade around our camp, hoping that it would keep the wolves out. That was a mistake for which we almost paid dearly."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig
cards.name: Thornhide Wolves

cards.flavor: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.
cards.name: Titanic Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Villagers employ watchdogs as guardians and companions. Druids prefer something a little bigger.
cards.name: Vigilant Baloth
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.flavor: When it passes, the dead are displaced by flourishing life.
cards.name: Vine Mare
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Vine Mare can't be blocked by black creatures.

cards.name: Vivien Reid
cards.text:
+1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
−3: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
−8: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance, trample, and indestructible."

cards.name: Vivien's Invocation
cards.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. When a creature is put onto the battlefield this way, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

cards.flavor: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.
cards.name: Wall of Vines
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

cards.flavor: The best of their trade know every bolt of their rigs, stem to stern.
cards.name: Aerial Engineer
cards.text: As long as you control an artifact, Aerial Engineer gets +2/+0 and has flying.

cards.name: Arcades, the Strategist
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever a creature with defender enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
Each creature you control with defender assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

cards.name: Brawl-Bash Ogre
cards.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Brawl-Bash Ogre attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Brawl-Bash Ogre gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Chromium, the Mutable
cards.text:
Flash
This spell can't be countered.
Flying
Discard a card: Until end of turn, Chromium, the Mutable becomes a Human with base power and toughness 1/1, loses all abilities, and gains hexproof. It can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor: "If I am to die, I will die in the embrace of immeasurable flame."
cards.name: Draconic Disciple
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Draconic Disciple: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: Many initiates believe it possesses secrets beyond imagining. Many have become meals trying to learn them.
cards.name: Enigma Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Enigma Drake's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: Cries of anguish quickly spurred cries of action.
cards.name: Heroic Reinforcements
cards.text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste. (They can attack and {T} this turn.)

cards.name: Nicol Bolas, the Ravager
cards.text:
Flying
When Nicol Bolas, the Ravager enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
{4}{U}{B}{R}: Exile Nicol Bolas, the Ravager, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen
cards.text:
+2: Draw two cards.
−3: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen deals 10 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
−4: Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
−12: Exile all but the bottom card of target player's library.

cards.flavor: Sister of Nicol Bolas. Survivor of the Elder Dragon War. The most vicious of her kin.
cards.name: Palladia-Mors, the Ruiner
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance, trample
Palladia-Mors, the Ruiner has hexproof if it hasn't dealt damage yet.

cards.name: Poison-Tip Archer
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Whenever another creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

cards.flavor: "I turn around and see nothing, yet I know it is behind me. Its fingers rummage in my mind, crafting new ideas."
cards.name: Psychic Symbiont
cards.text:
Flying
When Psychic Symbiont enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

cards.flavor: Those of esteemed birth earn a most esteemed death.
cards.name: Regal Bloodlord
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: "The threads of magic that protect this place were woven by my will."
cards.name: Satyr Enchanter
cards.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

cards.name: Skyrider Patrol
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {G}{U}. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control, and that creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Vaevictis Asmadi, the Dire
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Vaevictis Asmadi, the Dire attacks, for each player, choose target permanent that player controls. Those players sacrifice those permanents. Each player who sacrificed a permanent this way reveals the top card of their library, then puts it onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card.

cards.flavor: Whether it is magical, lucky, or merely old, it is cherished, and that gives it power.
cards.name: Amulet of Safekeeping
cards.text:
Whenever you become the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {1}.
Creature tokens get -1/-0.

cards.flavor: Knowledge itself is neither good nor evil. Just as the wrong book in the wrong hands could doom all existence, the same book in the right hands could save it.
cards.name: Arcane Encyclopedia
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Draw a card.

cards.name: Chaos Wand
cards.text: {4}, {T}: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of that library in a random order.

cards.flavor: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.
cards.name: Crucible of Worlds
cards.text: You may play land cards from your graveyard.

cards.flavor: The grave robbers were startled, for the door to the mausoleum was already open.
cards.name: Desecrated Tomb
cards.text: Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: When it passes, rainbows follow.
cards.name: Diamond Mare
cards.text:
As Diamond Mare enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Dragon's Hoard
cards.text:
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.
{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor:
"Souls are volatile things. When compressed and loaded into a handheld device, their destructive potential is quite impressive."
—Dierk, geistmage
cards.name: Explosive Apparatus
cards.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Explosive Apparatus: It deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.flavor: As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.
cards.name: Field Creeper

cards.flavor: Entrepreneurs have attempted to sell the water, but to no avail. Whatever magic it contains disappears upon bottling.
cards.name: Fountain of Renewal
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.
{3}, Sacrifice Fountain of Renewal: Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to."
—Bonovar, siege commander
cards.name: Gargoyle Sentinel
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.

cards.flavor: Made in its creator's image, though slightly more clangy.
cards.name: Gearsmith Guardian
cards.text: Gearsmith Guardian gets +2/+0 as long as you control a blue creature.

cards.name: Magistrate's Scepter
cards.text:
{4}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Magistrate's Scepter.
{T}, Remove three charge counters from Magistrate's Scepter: Take an extra turn after this one.

cards.flavor: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unwittingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.
cards.name: Manalith
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.flavor: A sharp axe solves most problems.
cards.name: Marauder's Axe
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: The impact sent the soldiers scattering—then something came out of the crater.
cards.name: Meteor Golem
cards.text: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

cards.flavor: Minds, like mountains, are never so grand and mighty that they can't be reduced to dust.
cards.name: Millstone
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

cards.flavor: Thievery requires subtlety, from the beginning of the heist to the end.
cards.name: Rogue's Gloves
cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Sigiled Sword of Valeron

cards.flavor: The municipal senate makes extensive use of the thopters, mostly to gather dirt on rival senators.
cards.name: Skyscanner
cards.text:
Flying
When Skyscanner enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.flavor: All the books were dusty with disuse, save the one titled Camouflage and Its Practical Applications.
cards.name: Suspicious Bookcase
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)

cards.flavor:
"I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine."
—Nicol Bolas

—Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab

cards.flavor: Waterways carve their routes through the land to reflect the paths the aether streams cut through the clouds.

cards.name: Ajani, Wise Counselor
cards.text:
+2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control.
−3: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
−9: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is your life total.

cards.name: Ajani's Influence
cards.text:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a white card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor:
"The healers of Bant are second to none. I owe them a great deal for their tutelage."
—Ajani Goldmane
cards.name: Court Cleric
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Court Cleric gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Ajani planeswalker.

cards.flavor: She watches over the city just as Serra watches over all.

Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.flavor: A pair of domesticated griffins escaped from captivity a century ago. Now the skies are filled with the songs of their descendants.
cards.name: Silverbeak Griffin

cards.text:
+1: Draw a card.
0: Until your next turn, target artifact you control becomes a 5/5 creature in addition to its other types.

cards.flavor: "Safe passage requires only a simple answer to a simple question, traveler."

Flying

cards.flavor: Its elaborate designs reveal secrets of aether's flow.

cards.name: Tezzeret's Gatebreaker
cards.text:
When Tezzeret's Gatebreaker enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a blue or artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
{5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Tezzeret's Gatebreaker: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

cards.flavor:
"More obedient than any dog."
—Tezzeret
cards.name: Tezzeret's Strider
cards.text: As long as you control a Tezzeret planeswalker, Tezzeret's Strider has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.name: Liliana, the Necromancer
cards.text:
+1: Target player loses 2 life.
−1: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
−7: Destroy up to two target creatures. Put up to two creature cards from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor:
"I'm not picky about what comes up, but the less decay, the better."
—Liliana Vess
cards.name: Arisen Gorgon
cards.text: Arisen Gorgon has deathtouch as long as you control a Liliana planeswalker. (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

cards.flavor: Once every seven years it flies on spectral wings over the moors of ancient battlefields.
cards.name: Gravewaker
cards.text:
Flying
{5}{B}{B}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Liliana's Spoils
cards.text:
Target opponent discards a card.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a black card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.flavor: The dead who wander beyond the safety of the city of Naktamun crave only to spread their curse.
cards.name: Tattered Mummy
cards.text: When Tattered Mummy dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

cards.name: Sarkhan, Dragonsoul
cards.text:
+2: Sarkhan, Dragonsoul deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature your opponents control.
−3: Sarkhan, Dragonsoul deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.

cards.flavor: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."
cards.name: Kargan Dragonrider
cards.text: As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

cards.flavor: "I am most myself when I am least human."

cards.text:
Sarkhan's Dragonfire deals 3 damage to any target.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a red card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

cards.name: Vivien of the Arkbow

+2: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.

"Approach from behind. That way, if it does charge, at least you aren't in front of it."
—Vivien Reid

"This imprint was the familiar of a friend."
—Vivien Reid

cards.flavor: Sarkhan wandered into a tomb and back in time.

cards.flavor: Just as the sun rises at dawn and the days lengthen in summer, the Sun Empire has awakened after long years of quiet.
